item.title: Climate change, sustainability
item.description: Concepts What is the problem: carbon emissions → higher temperatures → many effects [[Carbon pricing]] Who foots the bill: wealthy or developing nations?

item.title: Crypto
item.description: [[Investment instruments]] | [[Crypto Timeline]] Ideas and thoughts (not for Notion) 2022.08.21 What goes up must come down Really don’t get drawn in by the hype, if ETH surges up, it will come down equally quickly, when will I learn this #lesson?
